frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-gnordvpn-local
frozen.shortDescription: A Gnome extension that shows the NordVPN status in the top bar and provides the ability to configure certain aspects of the connection.
frozen.longDescription: A Gnome extension that shows the NordVPN status in the top bar and provides the ability to configure certain aspects of the connection.
